618680.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Sci-Fi Battler Pack 2
618680.description:
Whether you're looking for colony soldiers and engineers or large-scale alien bosses, Sci-Fi Battler Pack 2 is a pack you won't want to miss!

The battlers in this pack is a perfect companion to Sci-Fi Battler Pack and Sci-Fi Battlebacks. Created in Michael Rookard's signature painted style, Sci-Fi Battlers 2 features new enemies that will bring your futuristic battles to life. Inspired by a variety of modern video games and comic books, this pack features a sleek design and concepts to inspire your game development.

This pack contains:
  • 19 battlers that can be used in front view and side-view alike.
  • Varying sizes -- from small henchmen to big bad bosses.
  • Easy to use and formatted for RPG Maker MV.
  • Compatible with Sci-Fi Battlers, Sci Fi Battlebacks and Michael's free work.
  • BONUS: Facesets for each battler, compatible with RPG Maker MV.
618680.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
